item.title: Transfer window preview: What do Europe's big clubs need?

item.title: Transfer rumors, news: Man United want Gallagher loan, Atlético want €30m
item.description: Atlético Madrid midfielder Conor Gallagher is the subject of interest from Manchester United. Transfer Talk has the latest news and rumors.

item.title: NFL execs on how Tua Tagovailoa lost his edge and Mike McDaniel's support
item.description: What has gone wrong for Tagovailoa, what's the Dolphins' path forward and is there any interest in him?
